value:
The Orb purchase process
was not completed due to a
communications error.

Please go to the Shop menu
or select Menu on the title
screen, and then use the Complete
Purchase process to finish it.

The purchase process could
not be completed due to a
communications error.

Please go to the Shop menu,
the Purchase Orbs screen,
or select Menu on the title
screen, and then use the Complete
Purchase process to finish it.

Canceled.

Please go to the Shop menu,
the Purchase Orbs screen,
or select Menu on the title
screen, and then use the Complete
Purchase process to finish it.

If an error occurs during Orb
purchase and the purchase
process is interrupted, you can
resume the process here.

The interrupted purchase
process has been
completed.

An interrupted purchase
process could not be found.

The purchase process may have
already been completed. Please
restart the app and confirm your
total number of items.

Your use of Google Play Points
has earned you a reward in-game.
Would you like to receive any
related items now?

You have received a Google Play
Points reward.

No rewards received from using
Google Play Points can be found.

Note: The process may have
already been completed. Please
restart the app and confirm your
total number of Orbs.

If you would like to receive your
Google Play Points reward later,
please go to the Shop menu and
tap Complete Purchase to do so.
